exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="25"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FuHuoPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="16530fd9020"/>
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.7" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group width="750" height="1209" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="fuhuo_xin_png" x="126" y="309"/>
		<e:Image id="btnfuhuo" source="fuhuo_btn_png" y="876" x="231"/>
		<e:Label id="price" text="2乐豆" y="568" size="36" textAlign="center" x="329"/>
		<e:Label id="tiaoguo" text="跳过(5秒)>>" y="1055" size="36" textAlign="center" x="278"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0x4b1ba3"/>
	<e:Image source="gameOverBg_png" scale9Grid="93,456,564,16" height="100%"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="750" height="1209" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="btn" source="gameOverBtn_png" x="125" y="1015" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Rect id="bg" width="644" height="792" fillColor="0x6a30d2" x="53" y="181" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="GameOver_png" x="224" y="49" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="txt" text="" y="300" width="560" horizontalCenter="0" textAlign="center" x="53" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label text="查看我的资产" y="1158" x="292"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoginPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="login_bg_png" top="0" bottom="0" left="0" right="0"/>
	<e:Image id="btnStart" source="login_btnStart_png" horizontalCenter="0.5" bottom="240"/>
	<e:Image source="login_title_png" horizontalCenter="0.5" top="240"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RulePanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.6"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="750" height="1206" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect id="bg" width="614" height="1022" fillColor="0xffffff" x="68" y="92" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="top" source="rule_bg_png" x="167" y="131" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="btn" source="rule_btn_png" x="180" y="997" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="txtcontent" text="8个字母，将会获得区块奖励，奖励数额完全随 机，收集的字母可累计叠加，下局将全部作废， 需要从新开始收集。" textColor="0x666666" width="525" size="25" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" lineSpacing="16" fontFamily="Arial" x="113" y="657" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="StartMainPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="750" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
	<e:Group width="750" height="1209" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Label id="skip" text="跳过>>" y="1043" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="32" anchorOffsetY="0" height="72" anchorOffsetX="0" width="233" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" x="259"/>
		<e:Label text="请选择您的开局道具，开局直接使用" size="36" y="116" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetY="0" x="105"/>
		<e:Image id="icon" source="Shield_png" x="34" y="294"/>
		<e:Label id="Name" text="防护盾1" y="628" size="32" textAlign="right" horizontalCenter="-272.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195"/>
		<e:Label id="Price" text="1 乐豆" y="628" size="32" textColor="0xF7561E" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetX="0" width="192" horizontalCenter="-69"/>
		<e:Label id="describe" text="使用后可抵达一次伤害1" y="688" size="26" horizontalCenter="-169.5"/>
		<e:Image id="icon1" source="Aerocraft_png" x="456" y="330"/>
		<e:Label id="Name1" text="飞行器1" y="628" size="32" textAlign="right" horizontalCenter="75.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="195"/>
		<e:Label id="Price1" text="2 乐豆" y="628" size="32" textColor="0xF7561E" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetX="0" width="192" horizontalCenter="279"/>
		<e:Label id="describe1" text="使用后无视障碍1，飞行3秒钟" y="688" size="26" horizontalCenter="178.5"/>
		<e:Label id="txt" text="5" size="148" y="837" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TopPanelSkin" width="750" height="90" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="btnBack" source="back_png" left="30" top="30"/>
	<e:Image id="btnRule" source="rule_png" right="30" top="30"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HeChengPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.7" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="750" height="1334" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Group id="pao1" width="156" height="159" x="135" y="352">
			<e:Image source="Bubble_png" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Label id="txt1" text="区块高度" width="156" textAlign="center" lineSpacing="16" height="159" verticalAlign="middle" size="28" x="0" y="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="pao2" width="138" height="140" x="540" y="435">
			<e:Image source="Bubble_png" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="138" height="140"/>
			<e:Label id="txt2" text="哈希值" width="138" textAlign="center" lineSpacing="16" height="140" verticalAlign="middle" size="28" x="0" y="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="gold" source="Gold_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="541" x="219" width="312" height="253"/>
		<e:Image id="btn" source="btnInBag_png" horizontalCenter="0.5" bottom="75"/>
		<e:Label id="Marking" text="矿工标识:LRaEbg82JrXLe28B558wrGzq7uFVV1HCfm" y="848" size="28" width="750" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="group1" width="750" height="246" x="0" y="1344.5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image id="img5" x="0" y="12" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="img1" x="0" y="12" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="img2" x="0" y="12" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="img3" x="0" y="12" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="img4" x="0" y="12" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group2" width="750" height="200" x="0" y="1595.23">
		<e:Image x="0" y="-480" id="img6" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image x="0" y="-480" id="img7" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image x="0" y="-480" id="img8" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image x="0" y="-480" id="img9" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
		<e:Image id="img10" x="0" y="-480" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source=""/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="obstacleGroup" width="750" height="1284" y="50">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="main_zimukuang_png" bottom="12" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="zimuGroup" width="658" height="97" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" bottom="39" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="C" source="hui_C_png" x="12.96" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="H" source="hui_H_png" x="78.96" y="13"/>
		<e:Image id="A" source="hui_A_png" x="160.96" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="N" source="hui_N_png" x="232.96" y="13"/>
		<e:Image id="G" source="hui_G_png" x="326.96" y="12"/>
		<e:Image id="W" source="hui_W_png" x="410.96" y="16"/>
		<e:Image id="A1" source="hui_A_png" x="492.96" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="N1" source="hui_N_png" x="564.09" y="13"/>
		<e:Label id="txtC" text="11" background="true" backgroundColor="0xdb2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25" y="8" x="52"/>
		<e:Label id="txtH" text="11" x="126" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtA" text="11" x="203" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtN" text="11" x="297" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtG" text="11" x="373" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtW" text="11" x="460" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtA1" text="11" x="536.09" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
		<e:Label id="txtN1" text="11" x="625.09" y="8" background="true" backgroundColor="0xDB2121" size="16" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="25" height="25"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group top="54" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:Image id="proBg" source="progressBg_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="-12" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="g1" source="progressBar_png" x="13" y="-11"/>
		<e:Image id="g2" source="progressBar_png" x="44" y="-11"/>
		<e:Image id="g3" source="progressBar_png" x="74" y="-11" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="g4" source="progressBar_png" x="105" y="-11"/>

		<e:Image id="proBar" source="progressMask_png" x="11.5" y="-9"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TurntablePanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillAlpha="0.6"/>
	<e:Group id="hou" horizontalCenter="0" width="750" height="1334" verticalCenter="0" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image id="guang" source="light_png" anchorOffsetX="375" anchorOffsetY="375" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="xin" source="reward_xin_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="title" source="title1_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-230.5"/>
		<e:Label id="txtitle" text="生命值+1" horizontalCenter="0.5" size="35" verticalCenter="196.5"/>
		<e:Label id="txtdescribe" text="血量立刻恢复满格状态" horizontalCenter="0" size="29" verticalCenter="254.5"/>
		<e:Label id="skip" text="跳过 (5秒 ) >>" size="36" bottom="99" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="qian" anchorOffsetY="0" height="1334" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" width="750">
		<e:Image source="turntable_bg_png" y="203" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="12"/>

		<e:Image id="btnGo" source="turntable_go_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0.5" scale9Grid="11,139,242,20" bottom="202"/>
		<e:Image id="warpCir" source="deng1_png" x="91" y="189"/>
		<e:Image source="turntable_Pointer_png" y="241" x="342"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BackPanelSkin" width="750" height="88" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label text="捉住吴小贱" x="-1" y="0" width="100%" height="88" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" backgroundColor="0x2c313b" background="true" size="36" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Image id="ImgBack" source="BtnBack_png" anchorOffsetY="0" verticalCenter="0" left="30"/>
	<e:Rect id="btnBack" width="88" height="88" fillAlpha="0" left="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoginTipsPanelSkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0xffffff" fillAlpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="group" width="750" height="1209" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect id="bg" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" fillAlpha="1" height="250" y="480" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="525" x="113"/>
		<e:Label id="txtTitle" text="提示" y="513" textColor="0x000000" size="36" x="339"/>
		<e:Label id="txtDes" text="您还未登录，请先登陆！" textColor="0x000000" y="590" textAlign="center" size="32" x="199"/>
		<e:Label id="txtBtn" text="前往登录" y="664" size="32" backgroundColor="0x1f61db" background="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="525" anchorOffsetY="0" height="68" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" x="113"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ProgressImgSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ProgressBg_png" x="41" y="14"/>
	<e:Image id="Bar" source="ProgressBar_png" x="50" y="20" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<e:Image source="ProgressIcon_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>
